net.sandius.rembulan.lib

Interface LoaderProvider


  • public interface LoaderProvider
    A provider of library loaders.

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Abstract Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      String name()
      Returns the name of the library provided by this provider.
      LuaFunction newLoader(RuntimeEnvironment runtimeEnvironment, Table env)
      Returns a new instance of the loader function for this library.

    • Method Detail

      • name

        String name()
        Returns the name of the library provided by this provider.
        Returns:
        the name of the library

      • newLoader

        LuaFunction newLoader(RuntimeEnvironment runtimeEnvironment,
                      Table env)
        Returns a new instance of the loader function for this library.
        Parameters:
        runtimeEnvironment - the runtime environment to be used by the provider
        env - the global _ENV table used to load the library
        Returns:
        a new instance of the library loader
